b"There's more nuance and risk in these trades, but in summary I believe Moncler's outperformance versus Canada Goose's apparent underperformance against even their management's optimism will continue to propel the stocks divergence.\nIf you did get this far, thank you! $MONC $GOOS https://t.co/00sboOeWYH"

b'Rationale 2: Moncler traffic is relatively outpacing Canada Goose in all markets. Moncler is the more expensive sister-brand to Canada Goose, but the product they sell is more or less a "jacket". Nevertheless, something unique is happening in the data: $MONC is beating $GOOS! https://t.co/cX2O5SwXgk'
